query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  AVG(rating) as avg_rating,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sentiment = 'positive' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as positive_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sentiment = 'negative' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as negative_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as replied_count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = false THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_count
FROM guestReviews
